医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，传统的夜间脉搏血氧计读数可能不足以预测 TC-MRB众多睡眠呼吸障碍 (SDB) 参数的预测能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Traditional-overnight-pulse-oximeter-readings-may-be-insufficient-to-predict-TC-MRBs-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Traditional-overnight-pulse-oximeter-readings-may-be-insufficient-to-predict-TC-MRBs-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cebdece-072b-4bd4-8cf5-44f6a14b8a11 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 09:56:00 -0400 Traditional overnight pulse oximeter readings may be insufficient to predict TC-MRBs, finds study
乙酰水杨酸和华法林如何与各种营养素相互作用？ 45 种改变微量营养状态的药物-营养素相互作用 (DNI)，特别关注乙酰水杨酸 (ASA) 和华法林如何通过各种机制影响患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/How-do-乙酰水杨酸和-warfarin-interact-with-various- Nutritions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/How-do-乙酰水杨酸和-warfarin-interact-with-various- Nutritions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48179521-3074-46b0-8753-7793fd36ff77 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 09:04:00 -0400 How do acetylsalicylic acid and warfarin interact with various nutrients?
协助犬可以通过呼吸检测创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）闪回狗敏感的鼻子可以检测到许多潜在危险医疗情况的早期预警信号，例如即将发生的癫痫发作或突然的低血糖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Assistance-dogs-may-detect-PTSD-flashbacks-via-breath.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Assistance-dogs-may-detect-PTSD-flashbacks-via-breath.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a4c32e8-c97b-40c4-806b-96ecb25f9584 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 08:11:05 -0400 Assistance dogs may detect PTSD flashbacks via breath
AI 工具预测致命心律，准确率达 80%莱斯特的一项研究探讨了人工智能 (AI) 是否可用于预测一个人是否面临致命心律失常的风险，结果显示，人工智能工具在 80% 的情况下能够正确识别这种情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/AI-tool-predicts-lethal-heart-rhythm-with-8025-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/AI-tool-predicts-lethal-heart-rhythm-with-8025-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fda7e7d0-d7f1-40e2-91b1-611007777e9a Thu, 28 Mar 2024 07:57:41 -0400 AI tool predicts lethal heart rhythm with 80% accuracy
全球领导人制定了结束结核病流行的雄心勃勃的目标世界领导人在联合国大会结核病问题高级别会议上批准了一项政治宣言，其中提出了未来五年雄心勃勃的新目标，以推动全球努力结束结核病流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Global-leaders-set-ambitious-targets-to-end-tuberculosis-epidemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Global-leaders-set-ambitious-targets-to-end-tuberculosis-epidemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b71c9308-3d13-4238-a2c8-81aa5552884f Thu, 28 Mar 2024 07:51:15 -0400 Global leaders set ambitious targets to end tuberculosis epidemic
世卫组织和人权高专办发布指导改革立法以结束精神卫生保健中的强制做法在世界精神卫生日到来之际，世界卫生组织（世卫组织）和人权事务高级专员办事处（人权高专办）联合推出题为“精神卫生、人权与立法：指导与实践”的新指南，以支持各国改革立法，以结束侵犯人权行为并增加获得优质精神卫生保健的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/WHO-and-OHCHR-launch-guidance-to-reform-legislation-for-ending-coercive-practices-in-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/WHO-and-OHCHR-launch-guidance-to-reform-legislation-for-ending-coercive-practices-in-mental-health-care.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f1bea10-4b9d-4814-9926-212f58a70541 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 07:46:02 -0400 WHO and OHCHR launch guidance to reform legislation for ending coercive practices in mental health care
加州正在扩大寻求自行治疗的青少年的保险范围九年级时，菲奥娜·卢 (Fiona Lu) 陷入了抑郁。她很难适应加利福尼亚州奥兰治县的新高中，感到非常孤立和疲惫，每天早上都会哭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/California-is-expanding-insurance-access-for-teenagers-seeking-therapy-on-their-own.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/California-is-expanding-insurance-access-for-teenagers-seeking-therapy-on-their-own.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73e7de98-67aa-4163-9f44-c6884f423544 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 07:13:47 -0400 California is expanding insurance access for teenagers seeking therapy on their own
较长的母乳喂养时间可降低儿童患癌症的风险母乳喂养持续时间是否与降低儿童癌症风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Longer-durations-of-breastfeeding-lowers-the-risk-of-childhood-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Longer-durations-of-breastfeeding-lowers-the-risk-of-childhood-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea25b73c-ab17-432d-b267-37422687a411 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 07:03:00 -0400 Longer durations of breastfeeding lowers the risk of childhood cancers
纽约的研究强调污染是青少年癌症发病率上升的关键因素纽约州 (NYS) 成年人癌症发病率趋势以及与常见人口水平暴露的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Research-from-NY-highlights-pollution-as-a-key-factor-in-rising-cancer-rates-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Research-from-NY-highlights-pollution-as-a-key-factor-in-rising-cancer-rates-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6189f13-d0df-4538-9483-4e4294eb5dcd Thu, 28 Mar 2024 06:31:00 -0400 Research from NY highlights pollution as a key factor in rising cancer rates among youth
研究人员发现使用特定的避孕措施会增加脑肿瘤风险颅内脑膜瘤风险与孕激素的使用相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Researchers-identify-increased-brain-tumor-risk-with-specific-contraceptive-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Researchers-identify-increased-brain-tumor-risk-with-specific-contraceptive-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6b2364d-daad-4cb2-93a7-81113e2560e2 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 06:02:00 -0400 Researchers identify increased brain tumor risk with specific contraceptive use
